text: Mickey Jones (June 10, 1941 â€“ February 7, 2018) was an American drummer and actor. He was born in Houston, Texas. His career as a drummer had him backing up such artists and bands as Trini Lopez, Johnny Rivers, Bob Dylan, Kenny Rogers and The Band. He was known for his roles in Home Improvement, National Lampoon's Vacation, and Tin Cup. Jones died on February 7, 2018 from problems caused by an illness. He was 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American drummers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Houston Category:Musicians from Houston
title: Mickey Jones
